children.name: HTML
children.description: Custom HTML.

properties.html: <style>.target-volume,.target-volume div.repeater-table-div{width:100%!important}.target-volume div.repeater-table-div > vform-dynamic{width:calc(50% - 20px)!important}form-render vform-table div.table-container table th{white-space:nowrap;}app-repeater{overflow-x:auto}vform-dynamic{height:auto!important;display:block!important;}form-render div.treatment-progress .left{width:950px;} form-render div.treatment-progress .left .planRow .planSummary{width:120px;} form-render div.treatment-progress .left .planRow .planProgress{width:800px;} form-render div.treatment-progress .left .planRow .planProgress div:nth-child(1), form-render div.treatment-progress .left .planRow .planProgress div:nth-child(3){width:180px;} form-render div.treatment-progress .left .planRow .planProgress div:nth-child(2){width:520px;} form-render div.treatment-progress .small{font-size:14px;} form-render div.treatment-progress .right{justify-content:flex-end;} form-render multi-plan .multi-plan{width:600px;} form-render multi-plan .multi-plan .tittle{height: 20px; font-size: 16px;line-height: 0;font-weight:500;} multi-plan .plan-list{padding-right:10px;}  .fontbold{font-weight:bold;} .font12px{font-size:12px;} .font14px{font-size:14px;} .font16px{font-size:16px;} form-render .form-table-header{font-weight:bold;} form-render .repeater-default .repeater-header{font-size:16px;} vform-tab-layout .mat-tab-body{display:flex!important; justify-content:center;} .background-white{background-color:#FFFFFF;} .padding-right-20px{padding-right:20px;} md-tab-body .mat-tab-body-content{height:calc(100% - 5px);} vform-dynamic{height:auto!important;} form-render multi-plan .multi-plan .sign{align-items:center;} form-render multi-plan vform-esign{padding-bottom:3px;}form-dialog div.treatment-progress .left{width:950px;} form-dialog div.treatment-progress .left .planRow .planSummary{width:120px;} form-dialog div.treatment-progress .left .planRow .planProgress{width:800px;} form-dialog div.treatment-progress .left .planRow .planProgress div:nth-child(1), form-dialog div.treatment-progress .left .planRow .planProgress div:nth-child(3){width:180px;} form-dialog div.treatment-progress .left .planRow .planProgress div:nth-child(2){width:520px;} form-dialog div.treatment-progress .small{font-size:14px;} form-dialog div.treatment-progress .right{justify-content:flex-end;} form-dialog multi-plan .multi-plan{width:600px;} form-dialog multi-plan .multi-plan .tittle{height: 20px; font-size: 16px;line-height: 0;font-weight:500;} form-dialog .form-table-header{font-weight:bold;} form-dialog .repeater-default .repeater-header{font-size:16px;}  form-dialog multi-plan .multi-plan .sign{align-items:center;} form-dialog multi-plan vform-esign{padding-bottom:3px;} form-dialog .mat-tab-body-active{overflow-x: inherit!important; overflow-y: inherit!important;} form-dialog .mat-tab-body-wrapper{overflow:inherit!important;} form-dialog .background-white{border-left:0!important; border-right:0!important; border-bottom:0!important;} form-render dotreatment-history .treatmenttable{max-width:1200px;} treatment-schedule-container{height:100%}</style>
